com.esri.mo2.client.io
Class EsrimapInputStream

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.InputStream
        |
        +--java.io.FilterInputStream
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.client.io.EsrimapInputStream
public class EsrimapInputStream
extends FilterInputStream

This class provides methods to receive status headers and data using Esrimap version 3.x protocol. The data can be accessed like a standard java I/O stream.

Field Summary
protected  DataInputStream _dataIn
          The DataInputStream that contains the data sent back from the Application Server.

Constructs a new EsrimapInputStream object that allows you to read data from an Esrimap.

Parameters:

authenticator - the authenticator for the MapService
isCustomStream - a boolean variable indicating a custom stream
